SELECT REPLACE(ifnull(format(sum(cost) , 0), 0), ',' ,'') AS now_amount, DATE_FORMAT(fund_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS fund_date_a FROM fund WHERE fund_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND now() GROUP BY fund_date_a ORDER BY fund_date_a ASC

SELECT p.project_code , max(p.title) AS title , max(p.subtitle) AS subtitle , max(p.category) AS category , max(p.creator) AS creator , max(p.img_main) AS img_main , max(p.start_date) AS start_date , max(p.end_date) AS end_date , ifnull(format(sum(cost) , 0), 0) AS now_amount , ifnull(max(goal_amount), 0) AS goal_amount , ifnull(sum(cost) / max(goal_amount), 0) AS ratio , ifnull(TRUNCATE(sum(cost) / max(goal_amount) * 100, 0), 0) AS goal_rate , CASE count(p.project_code) WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE count(p.project_code) END AS donor FROM project p LEFT JOIN fund f ON p.project_code = f.project_code GROUP BY p.project_code ORDER BY end_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT SUM(cost) AS sum_cost FROM fund WHERE fund_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -1 WEEK) AND NOW()
